equivalent: 1 - drizzle, drops, hss, rain, shaa, sss
2 - chill, dismay, gloom, pale, unnerve, worry
3 - back up, hide, pull back, relent, retreat, scoot
comments: 1 - soft sounds of rain or shower
2 - an expression of worry or stress
3 - the act of moving away from something dangerous, difficult, or disagreeable
